name: design.toml
rawContent:
# Design Requirements

[design]
name = "LLM Boilerplate Design System"
description = "Visual design requirements and guidelines"

[design.theme]
mode = "light"  # light | dark | system
primary = "blue"
radius = "0.5rem"

[design.typography]
fontFamily = "Inter, system-ui, sans-serif"
monoFamily = "JetBrains Mono, monospace"
baseSize = "16px"

[design.layout]
maxWidth = "1280px"
containerPadding = "1.5rem"
headerHeight = "56px"

[design.components]
buttonStyle = "rounded"  # rounded | pill | square
cardStyle = "bordered"   # bordered | shadow | flat
inputStyle = "outlined"  # outlined | filled | underlined

[design.principles]
list = [
  "Clean and minimal interface",
  "Consistent spacing and alignment",
  "Clear visual hierarchy",
  "Accessible color contrast",
  "Responsive on all devices"
]

[design.palette]
background = "#ffffff"
foreground = "#0f172a"
muted = "#f1f5f9"
mutedForeground = "#64748b"
primary = "#3b82f6"
primaryForeground = "#ffffff"
secondary = "#f1f5f9"
secondaryForeground = "#0f172a"
accent = "#f1f5f9"
accentForeground = "#0f172a"
destructive = "#ef4444"
border = "#e2e8f0"
